tool_description: The Large text to speech (TTS) API enables you to perform unlimited text to speech synthesis in English with human-like voice quality. This API allows you to convert large amounts of text into spoken words efficiently.

api_list.name: Create TTS job
api_list.description: Request for a text to speech job to convert text into audio.

api_list.name: Get job status
api_list.description: Retrieve the status and results of a previously submitted TTS job.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the TTS job.
